Class TableExpertMode

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.Observable<ResponseMessage>
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Table
it.polimi.ingsw.model.TableExpertMode
public class TableExpertMode extends Table
Table class for match control, expert mode variant

    • getSupremacy

      public Player getSupremacy(Island island) throws ParityException
      returns the player who has the greatest influence on the island. If there's a NoEntryTile, returns the old owner of the island
      Overrides:
      getSupremacy in class Table
      Parameters:
      island - island on which calculate supremacy
      Returns:
      player with the greatest supremacy or old owner if there's a NoEntryTile
      Throws:
      ParityException - if there's a parity of the max influence

    • newIslandGroup

      public void newIslandGroup(List<Island> islands)
      creates an IslandGroup from a list of islands: adds all the students, sets the tower, removes the old Islands and changes all the Islands IDs. If there's a NoEntryTile on an island to merge, adds the NoEntryTile to the new island group
      Overrides:
      newIslandGroup in class Table
      Parameters:
      islands - : islands to merge
